email.subject: 2. GRADES
email.body:
Congratulations, you have successfully changed your Biology grades. Now you and Jennifer won't be stuck in summer school!
Jennifer asked you to change her grade back, before she left in a bit of a mood. You can change it back if you like, but girls have a habit of changing their minds - so you might choose to leave it. Besides, you like her and don't want her to flunk in school!
Now use the SCAN program from the school datanet to look for other systems. You are looking for ProtoVision in Sunnyvale (California) because you want to play their new games - but who knows what else you might find.
You have to find a way from Seattle to California by "hacking" your way through different systems on the ARPANET.
If you need help, maybe take a look at Seattle Tech Lab.
Reply back when you -think- you are done.

attachments.note: HACKING 1. SCAN the school network for other systems 2. Use PROBE/NMAP to scan for security on connected system, and use the "PASSWORD-LISTS-1.txt" (on your computer) for help 3. Download (SCP) ANY helpful programs (.exe) and text-files (.txt) you find 4. Get access to "SOUTHWEST DATACENTER" in California - and reply back 5. If in doubt use the HELP program
